name: QFX RETRO-39 Portable Shoebox USB to Cassette Tape Recorder, Analog Cassette Tape Deck with Built-in Microphone, 3.5" Bluetooth Speaker with FM Radio
short_description: Adaptable: This shoebox cassette tape recorder includes a 3.5-inch speaker, audio line input and output, and an integrated microphone for voice recording.
Maximum Connectivity: The cassette tape deck offers USB to cassette recording and supports external mic connectivity making it perfect for voice recordings.
Long-lasting: Power up with 4 "C" batteries (sold separately) or use the included AC power cord.
Portable: An attached swivel handle makes this recorder easy to take on the go to play your favorite jams or record voice notes.
Versatile: Use the USB port to plug in a thumb drive and play MP3s, FM Radio included.
Assistance: Please reach out to QFX directly at support@qfxusa.com for questions, problems or issues.

name: Small Cassette Player Recorder, Portable AM FM Vintage Tape Cassette Player with Big Speaker and Headphones, Built-in Microphone, Powered by DC or AA Battery for Walking
short_description: 【Classic Retro Experience】Experience the timeless charm of the cassette player, allowing you to play your favorite old tapes and relive the memories of the past while enjoying the simplicity of cassette audio.

【Versatile Recording Capabilities】This cassette player allows you to record audio or AM/FM radio onto blank cassettes via the built-in microphone. It also includes an external microphone for enhanced sound quality, making it perfect for capturing memories.

【Excellent Reception】With a 12.6-inch metal long antenna and a wide frequency range (FM 87-108MHz, AM 520-1710kHz), this cassette player provides excellent reception for all your favorite radio stations, ensuring you never miss a beat.

【Exceptional Audio Quality】Enjoy clear sound with the high-quality 3 Watts loudspeaker, making it perfect for listening to your cherished cassette tapes, or plug in your headphones via the 3.5mm earphone jack for a private listening experience.

【Lightweight and Portable Design】Measuring just 4.6 x 3.6 x 1.4 inches and weighing only 0.43lb, this portable cassette player is compact and easy to handle. Take it with you wherever you go, whether you're relaxing at home or out for a walk, for an effortless nostalgic experience.

【Dual Power Options 】This cassette player can be powered by a DC 5V wall adapter for indoor use or by 2 AA batteries when you’re on the move. Enjoy your classic tunes without interruption, no matter where you are.

【Durable Construction & Excellent Customer Service】Built to last, the cassette player features durable construction and comes with outstanding customer service, ensuring your satisfaction and support with your portable cassette players & recorders.

name: Crosley CR7023A-WA Serenade 8-in-1 Vinyl Record Player with 3-Speed Turntable, Bluetooth, AM/FM Radio, CD, Cassette, and Aux-in, Walnut
short_description: 8-In-1 MUSIC PLAYER: The entertainment center includes a three-speed belt-drive turntable with a cueing lever, 45 adapter, and auto stop. The record player also has an AM/FM radio, a CD player, a cassette player, aux input, and a headphone jack.
BLUETOOTH RECORD PLAYER: Bluetooth connectivity lets you stream music from your mobile device through the vinyl record player's built-in speakers.

QUALITY AUDIO: Dynamic full-range stereo speakers deliver 20 watts of sound. 20W Peak, 10W RMS, 5W RMS x 2 - Frequency response 20Hz -16KHz. Max power consumption is 12 watts. You can also use the RCA output to hook up to your stereo or external active speakers.
STYLE & CONVENIENCE: This entertainment center has removable tapered legs for a stylish mid-century modern look. This system is simple to set up, so you’ll be enjoying your music in no time.

DESIGN: Inspired by 100 years of Crosley innovations, our products blend vintage looks with modern technology. Crosley Radio products are proudly designed in the USA and come with USA-based customer support.
product_description: The Serenade 8-in-1 Record Player combines all your music needs into one retro package. You can play records, cassettes, CDs, and radio or use Bluetooth to stream digital playlists. This entertainment center has removable tapered legs and gold accents, adding a mid-century modern vibe to your home.

name: PROSCAN Retro Style Portable CD Boombox with AM/FM Radio- Top Loading CD - Aux-in Jack - AC & Battery Compatible - LCD Display - Carrying Handle
short_description: RETRO DESIGN: Rekindle nostalgic memories with Sylvania's Retro Boombox with built-in stereo speakers. It looks old-school but comes with superb sound quality and modern features.

PORTABLE & EFFICIENT: Our portable CD player's compact size and retro design, together with its folding handle, allow you to transport it anywhere and play your favorite music effortlessly. Your music is with you everywhere you go, whether it's in your living room, kitchen, gym, outdoor camping, yoga class, dancing class, or anywhere else you can think of.

AM/FM STEREO: Don't have a CD? Not a problem! Our portable radio has a built-in analog AM/FM tuner and a long antenna, allowing you to listen to the radio, music programming, talk programs, podcasts, news channels, and sporting channels while on the road.

WIDE COMPATIBILITY: We have you covered with a CD player, radio, or connect your favorite music source via our 3.5mm AUX input jack, smartphones, iPods, iPad, mp3 players, or headphones. Play your favorite songs whenever and wherever you want. Tone-touch function buttons let you shuffle, skip, and find music at your leisure.

ACCESSORIES: It comes with an LCD Display, AC Wall Adapter, and an incredible 20-track programmable memory. It can be powered by an AC 120V-60Hz power connection or by 9V (1.5V x 6C batteries (not supplied) for total mobility indoors and outdoors.
product_description: Retro design front-loading CD/CD-R/CD-RW player AM/FM radio (analogue tuning) LED display for CD function. 20-Track programmable memory aux-in jack (aux-in cable sold separately) AC power supply DC power: 6 C batteries (not included) output power: 1.2 Wx2

product_description: Jensen CR-100TE Teal Personal Cassette Player/Recorder is both portable and convenient. It also includes an AM/FM radio, so take it to the beach, the ball game, or anywhere else you want to listen to your favorite radio station, play old mix tapes, or audiobooks. Enjoy clear, static-free audio from the built-in speaker, and record from the radio or by using the built-in condenser microphone.

name: KLIM K8 Cassette Tape Player Portable + Cassette Recorder + New + AM/FM Walkman Cassette Player + Built-in Microphone & Speaker + Headphone Jack & Earphones
short_description: PLAYBACK & RECORDING: Immerse yourself in the nostalgia of analog audio with the K8 cassette tape recorder & cassette player. Effortlessly play your favorite cassette tapes and record directly onto them using the built-in microphone. It's the perfect way to capture memories or enjoy timeless classics!
AM/FM RADIO: The K8 functions as a radio cassette player. Tune into your favorite stations with the built-in AM/FM radio, providing access to a wide range of music, talk shows, and news.

ULTIMATE PORTABILITY: This cassette player has a 3.5mm earphone jack & included high quality earphones! Experience music on the move with this lightweight and portable cassette player with headphones, perfect for commuting, traveling, or simply enjoying your favorite tunes outdoors.
FLEXIBLE POWER OPTIONS: The KLIM K8 cassette player operates on either AA batteries for portable use or can be plugged in using an AC-DC adapter for continuous play at home.

BUILT TO LAST + ASSURANCE. We're committed to producing quality electronics using higher quality components, built to last, so you can expect this cassette player to stay with you for many years. However, If you were to ever encounter any problem, you're covered for 5-years.

name: Victrola The Quincy 6-in-1 Bluetooth Record Player & Multimedia Center with Built-in Speakers – 3-Speed Turntable, CD & Cassette Player, AM/FM Radio, Wireless Music Streaming (Mahogony)
short_description: 6-in-1 ENTERTAINMENT CENTER – With vintage looks on the outside & modern features inside, listen your way; vinyl records, CDs, cassettes, AM/FM radio or stream music from your smartphone via Bluetooth or 3.5 mm Aux/headphone jack.Motor type : AC Motor

NO STEREO SYSTEM OR EXTRA EQUIPMENT REQUIRED. Get it up and running in minutes. Retro looks combined with the convenience of modern technology make this record player a great value - ideal for beginners & vintage enthusiasts alike

THREE SPEED BELT-DRIVEN TURNTABLE – This 3-speed (33 1/3, 45, 78 rpm) record player features UPGRADED PREMIUM SOUND QUALITY with minimum vibrations. It is perfect for your living room, bedroom or office and a great choice for vinyl lovers

EXPANDED CONNECTION OPTIONS – Extend the sound by connecting external speakers or an amplifier via the RCA Line outputs (cable included). For personal listening, plug your headphones into the headphone jack

ALL THE CONTROLS YOU NEED – Features an input select knob, power button, volume knob, AM/FM tuner, play/pause/fast forward/rewind buttons, program & repeat buttons, open/close button for CD tray, eject switch for cassettes - everything is right there

HIGH QUALITY DESIGN & FINISHING – Victrola's 115-year commitment to craftsmanship is evident in the stylish retro real wood case, strong hinges, high quality fabric grilles, gentle lifting mechanism and well-balanced sound
Wirelessly stream music from your Bluetooth enabled device, up to 33 feet away
product_description: The Victrola Nostalgic 6-in-1 Solid Wood Record Player and Multimedia Player is a perfect blend of modern technology and nostalgic design. Perfect for vinyl lovers, the Classic Nostalgic Turntable features a 3-speed phono, a CD Player, a cassette tape player, and a AM/FM radio. With built-in Bluetooth, you can now stream music from your tablet, smartphone or MP3 using Bluetooth. That’s not all – with 3.5mm Auxiliary Input, USB port and Headphone jack, the turntable opens a world of music possibilities that were unimaginable in the earlier Vinyl days. This stylish retro turntable designed with real wood construction and smart front paneling is a great conversation piece!

product_description: The Studebaker SB2130 Cassette Player/Recorder with AM/FM radio is a retro portable with classic styling and easy to use features. This unit features cassette recording from the radio, mic (built-in condenser mic) and aux-in jack. The speaker delivers excellent sound with clear and static-free audio. Play music from other devices like your tablet, MP3 player or other digital audio players using the built-in auxiliary input jack. The compact, durable design features a carrying handle and telescopic antenna. The SB2130 operates on 120V AC detachable power cord or 6 x "C" batteries (not included) which makes the radio perfect for taking with you anywhere you go.
